name: OR_LNLG_LAT_MOD
description: A modifier to make laterality documentation more specific.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LATERALITY_MOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The laterality modifier category number in the laterality modifier table specifies the laterality for more accurate documentation.
